content:
Thank you @wetheclimate for a great story about the positive impact of @HargolFoodTech grasshoppers as an alternative protein source!
https://t.co/CqoHowrJsw
#alternativeprotein #foodtech #agritech

@Cornfrmr It's really more alternative as opposed to "fake". Fake is a term used by those who don't like change or something different. IMO. I am not a vegetarian, however I am very interested in producing protein anyway we can in less footprint more sustainable way.

@RadioRodThorson @Kimbrellfarms06 I'm bullish alternative protein.  I believe we have a protein problem. Not a cow, pig or chicken problem. There is a big difference. The mistake many in traditional agriculture make is they assume it has to start with a cow as opposed to a first principles clean slate solution.
